Actions.Name: Search for a company
Actions.Description: Retrieve list of companies that match the keywords in their name. The number of results is limited to 200. Use the 'page' parameter to retrieve more results.

Actions.Name: Get company information by NIF
Actions.Description: Retrieve company information for specified NIF.

Actions.Name: Get company information by Slug
Actions.Description: Retrieve company information for specified Slug, a slug is a concatenation of key words that represent the company

Actions.Name: Get company incorporation information by Slug
Actions.Description: Retrieve company incorporation information for specified Slug.

Actions.Name: Validate NIF
Actions.Description: Check whether a NIF is valid or not and return information that can be infered from a NIF number, such as the legal form, company type and register province.

Actions.Name: Get person information (slug)
Actions.Description: Retrieve person information for specified Slug.

Actions.Name: Search for a person
Actions.Description: Retrieve list of people that match the keywords in their name. The number of results is limited to 200. Use the 'page' parameter to retrieve more results.
